Text: OC Transpo Route 11 is a major cross-town bus route operated by OC Transpo in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

<Text: OC Transpo Route 11:  Although not recognized as a rapid transit route by OC Transpo, it goes across-town.>
Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 11
4:
--------------------
Text: OC Transpo Route 11: It was re-numbered to Route 11 from Route 2 on April 23, 2017.
